scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run clean && mkdir build
scripts.build: npm run css & browserify -d src/js/MyersDiffUI.js -o build/myersdiffui.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.prepackage: npm run build && copyfiles -u 1 web/* build && mkdir dist && copyfiles -u 1 build/* dist & npm run copybootstrapdist
